H0.text: What was the title of the fourth 'Alien' film starring Sigourney Weaver . Alien Resurrection

H1.text: What was the title of the fourth 'Alien' film starring Sigourney Weaver . Alien Genesis

H2.text: What was the title of the fourth 'Alien' film starring Sigourney Weaver . Alien Evolution

H3.text: What was the title of the fourth 'Alien' film starring Sigourney Weaver . Alien 4

A4.text: Alien Resurrection is a 1997 American science fiction horror film starring Sigourney Weaver and is the fourth installment of the Alien franchise.

A5.text: The film is titled Alien Resurrection, not Alien Genesis.
